Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.30423858] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=15μM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=15μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.30423858] 100% hemolysis MHC=40μM against human blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Deconvolution spectra by SELCON and CONTILL method indicated more than 70% helical structure for P3-Ll-2085
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-nagetive bacteria.

Literature.Title: Leptodactylus latrans Amphibian Skin Secretions as a Novel Source for the Isolation of Antibacterial Peptides
Literature.Reference: Molecules. 2018 Nov; 23(11) 2943. Published online 2018 Nov 11. doi 10.3390/molecules23112943
Literature.Author: Alvaro Siano, Maria Veronica Humpola, Eliandre de Oliveira, Fernando Albericio, Arturo C Simonetta, Rafael Lajmanovich, Georgina G Tonarelli
